ch.uzh.agglorecommender.visu

Class TreeVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.visu.TreeVisualizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class TreeVisualizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    The view component of the M-V-C-pattern used for the clustering subsystem. (M:TreeBuilder-V:TreeVisualizer-C:GUIClusteringController)
